properties.label: Access key
properties.description: Provide AWS IAM access key that has permission to publish to desired SNS topic

properties.label: Secret key
properties.description: Provide AWS IAM secret key that has permission to publish to desired SNS topic
This value forces to evaluate configuration first in order

properties.label: Topic ARN
properties.description: Specify the topic you want to publish to

properties.label: Region
properties.description: Specify the AWS region of your topic
Backwards compatible region

properties.label: Subject
properties.description: Specify the subject of the message you want to publish in the SNS topic

properties.label: Message
properties.description: Data to publish in the SNS topic

properties.label: Message attributes
properties.description: Message attributes metadata

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Authentication
properties.description: Specify AWS authentication strategy. Learn more at the documentation page

properties.label: Access key
properties.description: Provide an IAM access key tailored to a user, equipped with the necessary permissions

properties.label: Secret key
properties.description: Provide a secret key of a user with permissions to invoke specified AWS Lambda function

properties.label: Topic ARN
properties.description: Specify the topic you want to publish to

properties.label: Topic type
properties.description: Select SNS topic type. Details at AWS SNS Features

properties.label: Region
properties.description: Specify the AWS region

properties.label: Endpoint
properties.description: Specify endpoint if need to use custom endpoint

properties.label: Message group ID
properties.description: Message group ID (FIFO only). See also message grouping for FIFO topics in the Amazon SNS developer guide

properties.label: Message deduplication ID
properties.description: Message deduplication ID. See also Message deduplication for FIFO topics in the Amazon SNS developer guide

properties.description: Specify the subject of the message you want to publish in the SNS topic

properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries
